name: FromSlime
description:
From Slime

A game about being a slime, starting with nothing. Sliming their way through the abandoned crypts of necropolis for the parts that truly define a Human Being.

Windows users

-Download .zip
-Extract somewhere
-Run the .exe and play the game

Linux users

-Download .zip
-Extract somewhere
-Run the .exe with Wine

Mac Users

I don't know, sorry.
